description: This file configures the Angular application's providers, including routing, HTTP client, zone change detection, and client hydration.

methods.name: provideZoneChangeDetection
methods.description: Provides zone change detection with event coalescing enabled.

methods.name: provideRouter
methods.description: Provides routing configuration for the application.

methods.name: provideClientHydration
methods.description: Enables client-side hydration with event replay.

methods.name: provideHttpClient
methods.description: Provides Angular's HTTP client with interceptors.
